description:
While Zoe fights off the werewolf, the other students finally reach Philomela. Chise takes a dive into her dark memories, but as everyone`s secrets begin to unravel, Philomela hesitates to take her classmates` outstretched hands.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Burnt Child Dreads the Fire.
A Burnt Child Dreads the Fire.
A burnt child dreads the fire.
